title: Dog leaps for joy while out for a stroll with owner
text:
The crisp fall weather has brought boundless bliss to one rambunctious pooch out on a walk with its owner, sending the pet leaping into the air.

A viral video shared by Barstool Sports on Instagram showing the high-spirited pup's antics has drawn more than 2.5million views as of Monday morning.

In the short clip, the owner walks down a residential street in an unknown city with a shaggy grey-and-white English sheepdog on a leash.

Can't stop the feeling: This rambunctious English sheepdog was loving the crisp fall weather while out on a walk with its owner

Up, up and away! Unable to contain its excitement, the pooch leaped into the air

The energized sheepdog continued pull on the leash and bouncing along

Bystanders recording the spectacle broke out in laughter admiring the pooch

The boisterous pup, which appears to be thrilled being outside, gambols ahead of its owner.

A few seconds in, the furry friend leaps into the air, lifting all four paws clear off the ground.

The spectacle draws peals of laughter from the bystander recording the video on her phone from across the street.

Not impressed: The pup's owner remained seemingly impervious to its charming display of delight and strode on

Meanwhile, the excited dog continues bouncing and leaping down the street, repeating the gravity-defying feat at least four more times.

The pup's owner, however, remains seemingly impervious to its charming display of delight and continues on her way.

Comedian Johnny Knoxville, of Jackass fame, quipped in a comment likening himself to the happy pup: 'Me headed to the bar.'
description: A viral video shared by Barstool Sports on Instagram showing the high-spirited English sheepdog's antics has drawn more than 2.5million views as of Monday morning.
